Detailed Description

A class for indicating that a plug-in utilizes the expiration date activation policy.

This class is used to indicate that plug-in is enabled if the current date is prior to the date specified for the plug-in to expire. See the documentation of DzPlugin for a description of how to easily implement and provide activation policies in a DAZ Studio plug-in.
